data.title: University of North Carolina Athletics
data.meta_description: Kevin Hester Jr. (98) Defensive Line - 2023 – Senior Season Appeared in and started 12 games on the defensive line • Recorded 30 tackles, two QB pressures an...
data.text:
2023 – Senior Season

Appeared in and started 12 games on the defensive line • Recorded 30 tackles, two QB pressures and a fumble recovery • Recorded three tackles in the season opener against South Carolina • Had a QB pressure versus Minnesota • Made two tackles at Pittsburgh • Collected four tackles against Miami • Tallied a season-high eight tackles versus Virginia • Had two tackles at Georgia Tech • Made three tackles against Campbell • Registered four tackles and a fumble recovery at Clemson • Added three tackles at NC State • Registered a QB pressure versus West Virginia in the Duke’s Mayo Bowl.

2022 – Junior Season

Appeared in all 14 games, starting nine, on the defensive line and special teams • Posted 49 tackles and a TFL • Had three tackles against FAMU • Added three tackles at App State • Registered a career-high six tackles at Georgia State • Tallied three stops against Notre Dame • Notched three tackles at Miami • Added five tackles at Duke • Posted four tackles and a half TFL against Pitt • Registered three tackles at Virginia. • Matched his career-high with six tackles at Wake Forest and against Georgia Tech • Recorded two tackles vs. NC State • Made two stops at the ACC Championship game against Clemson • Added four tackles against Oregon at the Holiday Bowl.

2021 – Sophomore Season

Appeared in 13 games as a reserve defensive lineman • Finished the season with 20 tackles, 2.5 TFL, 1.5 sacks, one forced fumble, one breakup and one hurry • Had a pair of tackles against Georgia State and at Georgia Tech • Had three stops and registered his first collegiate sack against Duke • Had a half sack, a hurry and two tackles at Pittsburgh • Made a career-high four tackles and had a tackle for loss against Wofford • Notched a first career breakup at NC State • Had four stops against South Carolina at the Duke's Mayo Bowl.

2020 – Redshirt Freshman Season

Appeared in 10 games on the defensive line • Had 10 total tackles, one tackle for loss, one fumble recovery and one forced fumble • Had two stops and one tackle for loss against Wake Forest • Had two stops, forced a fumble and recovered a fumble against Western Carolina • Recorded two tackles at No. 9 Miami • Registered a season-high three tackles in the Orange Bowl against No. 5 Texas A&M • Redshirted in 2019 • Appeared in the Mercer game and had one tackle for loss in his collegiate debut against the Bears.
